pages.text: $(#630000)Phase Boosters are special equippables that multiply the gain of Evolution Points for the world.
$(#630000)Phase Boosters are special equippables that multiply the gain of Evolution Points by the wielder.

$(#630000)Phase Boosters are separated into four stages, akin to a Nexus-tier parasite. Each one requires two of the last stage to be crafted, and passively drains Experience.$(br)This has its own slot in the Malleability Menu, opened with $(k:srpcotesia.mallmenu).
